text: Bhajom apane raba mu'afi vala ate ajihi janata vala jisa di vi'apakata akasa ate dharati varagi hai. Uha unham lokam la'i ti'ara kiti ga'i hai jihare alaha ate usa de rasulam te imana li'a'e. Iha alaha di kirapa hai. Uha usa nu dida hai jisa nu cahuda hai. Alaha ati'ata bakhasisam da malaka hai
